description.general: A spear to take down animals or sharks.
description.2: An improved spear that can quickly take down animals or sharks.
description.3: An improved spear that can quickly take down animals or sharks even faster.
description.4: An improved spear that does more damage to wildlife.
description.5: A fully improved spear that does even more damage to wildlife.

description.general: Scavenges shipwrecks.
description.2: Scavenges shipwrecks faster. Ideal for medium shipwrecks.
description.3: Scavenges shipwrecks even faster. Ideal for large shipwrecks.
description.4: A tool that is used for harvesting shipwrecks of any size while producing more yield.
description.5: A better tool that is used for harvesting shipwrecks of any size while producing more yield.

description.general: A spyglass.
description.1: A basic spyglass with one zoom level.
description.2: An improved spyglass with an additional zoom level as it has two lenses in it.
description.3: A more improved spyglass that can see much further away as it has three lenses in it.

description.general: Allows harvesting from plants.
description.2: Harvests plants with slightly increased efficiency.
description.3: Harvests plants with moderately increased efficiency.
description.4: Harvests plants with greatly increased efficiency. Grants the opportunity for an extra bonus yield.
description.5: Harvests plants with significant increased efficiency. Grants the opportunity for an extra bonus yield.

description.general: Allows harvesting from trees.
description.2: Harvests trees with slightly increased efficiency.
description.3: Harvests trees with moderately increased efficiency.
description.4: Harvests trees with greatly increased efficiency. Grants the opportunity for an extra bonus yield.
description.5: Harvests trees with significant increased efficiency. Grants the opportunity for an extra bonus yield.

description.general: Allows harvesting from deposits.
description.2: Harvests deposits with slightly increased efficiency.
description.3: Harvests deposits with moderately increased efficiency.
description.4: Harvests deposits with greatly increased efficiency. Grants the opportunity for an extra bonus yield.
description.5: Harvests deposits with significant increased efficiency. Grants the opportunity for an extra bonus yield.

description.general: Contains 100 cannonballs that can be used in Cannon weapons.
Contains 60 bombard bombs that can be used in Bombard weapons.
Contains 20 ballista bolts that can be used in Ballista weapons.
Contains 60 oil canisters that can be used in Sea Fire weapons.
Contains 20 mortar bombs that can be used in Mortar weapons.
Contains 100 rockets that can be used in Rocket Launcher weapons.
Contains 60 torpedoes that can be used in Torpedo Launcher weapons.
Dark hues on interlocking plates; a rudimentary yet impenetrable marriage of steel and might.
Red-brown scales meld with black iron; a fusion of nature and craft against the depths.
La Fortresse is liky stormy seas -- dark blue and gold signify reliability against the chaos of the deep blue.
Woven wood merges with a metallic sheen, a testament in roguish toughness and intricate defense.
Layered planks seal off any breaks in the hull, making the ship airtight and sturdy.
Adorned in teal and mustard, the design echoes the stalwart longboats of yore.
Fit for Scurlock himself, the red and golden plates were forged to be the strongest when they are at their weakest point.
Sewn together from the hide of Kuharibu, a sea monster fabled to possess powerful, regenerative properties.
Engineered by La Peste's cronies. Its surface is coated to be resistant to their own toxic arsenal.
Smeared with toxic chemicals and effuses putrid fumes with every crest of the waves.
Glamorous and golden. An invitation to all pirates to pursue their own riches.
Massive artillery that delivers a single devastating shell, dealing immense damage over a large area.
Massive artillery that fires shrapnel-bearing shells. Remarkable at ripping holes into hulls and causing ships to be Flooded.
Philippe La Peste's signature artillery that launches putrid projectiles unto his hapless foes, releasing fumes that damage targets and drain Crew Stamina.
Delivers adhesive packs that expand on impact over a wide area, filling holes between the broken beams of allied ships.
Rapid firing rocket launcher that sends barrages of fiery missiles.
Rocket launcher originating from the Far East with a higher angle of aiming to attack taller structures more easily. Delivers a barrage of fiery missiles that deals increased damage to structures.
Rains destructive shells and is able to damage multiple foes within its radius.
A grandiose Scottish bombard constructed to shatter castle walls. The perfect weapon against structures.
Massive Ottoman weapon of terrifiying might. The guns are fired in unison for maximum devastation.
Rains destructive shells and is able to damage multiple foes within its radius. Incendiary shells set targets Ablaze.
Launches adhesive packs that expand on impact, filling holes between the broken beams of allied ships.
Fires devastating torpedos that deal double damage after being armed. Cannot target structures.
Fires high-explosive torpedos that can damage multiple targets. Torpedos deal double damage after being armed. Cannot target structures.
A refinement of Rahma's original torpedo design. Increasingly destructive when multiple torpedos hit at the same time.
A refinement of Rahma's original torpedo design. Increasingly destructive when multiple torpedos hit at the same time.
Launches giant bolts with great precision. Draw the ballista for greater power and range.
Launches giant bolts that are designed to rip sails apart. Draw the ballista for greater power and range.
The double-winches of this ballista can be further cranked for greater draw weight and power.
Spews liquid fire over a short range, immolating everything within distance.
This modified Sea Fire is exceptional at rendering ships vulnerable to Crew Attacks.
Hellish weapon of mysterious origins. Emits bluish flames of otherwordly temperatures.
Versatile cannon with good range, damage and reload speed.
Versatile cannon with good range, damage and reload speed. Great at tearing enemy sails and leaving them immobile.
Heavy bronze culverin aptly named after the deadly mythic serpent. Designed to render ships vulnerable to Crew Attacks.
Long-barrel cannons adept at hitting faraway targets.
Long-barrel cannons adept at hitting faraway targets. Incendiary shots set targets Ablaze.
Fires casings filled with adhesive goo that repair gaps in allied ships.
Infamous long guns that Scurlock has used to cripple many a ship, dismantling their masts before the Kingpin charges in for the kill.
Infamous long guns that Scurlock has used to cripple many a ship, dismantling their masts before the Kingpin charges in for the kill.
Fires deadly shrapnel that rips ships apart at short range.
Fires deadly shrapnel that rips ships apart at short range. Great at ripping holes in enemy hulls and causing them to be Flooded.
A revolutionary, lightweight cannon. The advanced design boasts power, accuracy, and low recoil, at the expense of range.
Short ranged, large-bore cannon that fires with thunderous power. Adept at rendering ships vulnerable to Crew Attacks.
Mends a amount of the ship's hull
description.1: Mends a minimal amount of the ship's hull.
description.2: Mends a modest amount of the ship's hull.
description.3: Mends a moderate amount of the ship's hull.

description.general: Mends a percentage of the ship's hull
description.1: Mends a modest percentage of the ship's hull.
description.2: Mends a moderate percentage of the ship's hull.
description.3: Mends a greater percentage of the ship's hull.

description.general: Removes all status effects from the ship.
A popular meat dish seasoned with spices, skewered on a stick, and then grilled.
These coconut balls are grilled golden brown and then coated with grated coconut flakes.
A staple for any sailor: stick a fish over a flame and watch it turn moist and crispy.
Firm and tender in texture while mild in flavor. Taste is not far from fish.
The predator has become the prey. When grilled, its meat exudes a pungent smell, but fills the belly.
Soft, tender mutton that has been spiced, slow-grilled, and left simmering for hours.
A whole chicken grilled till golden brown. A simple meal for the weary seafarer.
One of the oldest foods that can be traced back to the beginnings of agriculture.
These grilled plantains make for a sweet and savory snack.
Freshly grilled prime cut from a Hippo. Its meat is gamey but flavorful.
Freshly grilled prime cut from a crocodile. Its meat is firm, tender, and stringy.
Grilled meat from an ancient predator known to stalk the African Coast. Firm and slightly sweet.
These sweet cakes are filled with screwpine and the grilled in pandan leaves to give their green color.
Herbs, leaves and vegetables scrunched up from the Indian Ocean and grilled over a fire. A simple but hearty meal.
Durian slices that are dried, then grilled. Pungent on its own, these crisps are sweet and smokey.
Tastes slightly sweet with a tough texture.
Rice served with fatty chunks of meat.
Traditional coconut cake made with the 'cocotte' kettle over a charcoal cooker.
Succulent fish cooked with vegetables and eaten with rice.
A plantains-based stwe with chicken. A fragant meshing of the sweet and savory.
A stew of many meats, spiced and seasoned well.
Mutton, seasoned, skewered and grilled on charcoal. Sweet, savory and juicy.
Made from a thick meat stew, the cooled, rolled into a ball, breaded and finally cooked.
Whole chicken broth prepared with fresh ingredients.
The meat of Kuharibu, carefully wrapped in a blend of tomatoes and spies, and then baked in sweet coconut milk with local roots.
Consists of fish and spices wrapped in a leaf parcel and either grilled or steamed.
Well, wouldn't need to patch ya up if you'd shot at the bastards first, now would I?
Release the anchor, Captain! Those gutter swabs won't be able to hit us!
Oi, lad! Use a spoon to wipe your ass? That's the trim rope, not the anchor line!
Keep yer eye on that enemy ship, lad! Don't let me catch ya sneaking winks at them mermaids!
A pickaxe, butter knife, or your damned left shoe! Patch the hull, me hearties!
Hear that, scallywags? That ain't the fucking dinner bell!
Here they come, sea dogs! And if Davy Jones comes knocking, tell 'im we ain't ready for his locker yet!
With each blast of the horn, our cannons barked louder.
Careful with that mix, you bastards! I'm not having my other brow seared off!
Grab yer tools, sea rats! We'll mend the hull faster than they make holes in it!
Captain, are we counting fleas on their coats? Can we fucking shoot yet?!
Three days without water, you say? Bah. A day without rum is its own hell.
Who repairs the forge when the forge needs repairs?
A thicker hull means we're tougher, but we'll also sink faster than a drunkard's dreams!
This ain't tea time, arsetits! To your battle stations!
Load the chains, boys! We've leave their sails limp in the wind!
Don't fret if you lose a limb, lads. We've got spare pegs at the shop!
A pinch of this, a little dash of that, and voil√†! A fiery delight for our foes!
The lead's for their throats, lads, not your fucking afternoon tea!
To arms, me hearties! And while we're at it, let's take a few of theirs!
Aye, thick and nasty, lads! Want it clinging to the hull like a lover's bum in a lap!
This spot's for goods, not your goodies! I'd better not find hidden grog or lady portraits back here!
Which came first, the wood or the wood that chopped the wood?
Every raunchy crew's got an artist, y'know? And ours? Well, he's an expert at drawing... certain symbols.
Cap'ain's got a death wish, keeping these barrels out in the open? One spark and we're a fucking bonfire!
Pull, boys! We'll have those sails trimmed faster than a blade on a bald's crown!
General and all purpose -- and no, sea rats, this doesn't mean I can't make up my fucking mind.
Oi, you filthy lot! Wipe that much off your boots before stepping in!
Now that's more like it.
Head about the races in the East Indies, the stragglers sneaking past Megafort Oosten's cannons...
It just works. It kills fucks faster.
Daman always wanted to spit fire at his foes. Until one day, they spat back...
Beneath Maja's prayers and angelic grace, lurked a darkness, a secret space.
Danny wantetd to wash his face. Now, he has no face.
Steel yourselves, lads! We'll plow through 'em like piss and paper!
That ain't fairy dust, boys, but it'll still make your foes go 'poof!
Think it's snuff, eh? Go on, take a sniff! Get ready for a real mind-blowing experience. Heh heh heh.
Don't be fooled by its pretty name, lads. Its beauty is in its destruction!
Oh, Isabelle, silent as the deep. With bolts she strikes where sea monsters creep.
Balrai yearned for his native hearth. In battle's chaos, his heart cried out in spicy mirth.
Smog was his fiery name, barking smoke and spewing tepid flames.
Time to do things the old-fashioned way.
Amara's wit, once a spark so bright, but stillness fell during the failed heist's blight.
Big Martha marked the seas, her wit and scorn for all to see.
Shiro, as white as purest snow. Innocence veiled, blood's tale yet to show.
I've seen a bolt pierce three men in a row. Let's aim for four!
Not just blades that need grinding, mate. Remember an ex-lover getting an intimate look, the cheating bastard...
What's a grindstone good for 'sides sharpening weapons? Can't remove curses, can it?
Heard of Captain Longarm? Was sharpening his cannons one day when his hand got a little too close...
Sharpen those barrels, boys! Those 'pedos need to slice like a drunken sailor's purse strings.
What's a grindstone good for 'sides sharpening weapons? Can't remove curses, can it?
How'd you fucking like THIS for a naked flame?!
Aye, the blaze. Reminds me of the night dear Kat was claimed, and when I hoisted the colors tto feel her soft fur again.
Aye, make those shells scorching hot! We'll let loose on 'em like a belly full of bad oysters!
Stick the tubes in the furnace! Let our foes boil in their wake!
Matt always wore white, each splotch of black a badge of honor.
Aye, the blaze. Reminds me of the might dear Kat was claimed, and when I hoisted the colors to feel her soft fur again.
No naked flames, please! No, like, seriously.
For fuck's sake! I said no, naked, flames!
I see a drop of green spreading, till the entire ocean is an emerald death.
Shrapnel fired from this demi-cannon is designed to cause collateral damage. On impact, iron pieces ricochet to nearby targets, making this weapon adept against a crowded fleet of ships.
This destructive weapon quite literally levels the playing field by raining large, explosive rockets from above.
Unique and highly-advanced torpedoes employed by Armand and Bertrand Hubac. Their target-seeking capabilities make them a challenge to evade.
A malicious weapon wielded by La Peste's cronies. Fires tainted shells that drain Crew Stamina. These toxic gases also cannot be blocked by bracing.
They won't tell the difference. Ha ha ha!
A flash of spice, a dash of powder. No, this ain't an explosion out yer' arse, mate.
Get those tubes loaded! Or I'll stuff you in myself.
A full orchestra upon the waves. May their voices be your shield.
Promises etched into the hull prove sturdier than any piercing shot.
Launches Minefield Buoys using a complex system of springs and gears. These buoys deploy a field of deadly naval mines, as traps against unsuspecting victims.

An advanced modification of the Mine Springloader that launches Fire Minefield Buoys. Apart from releasing fiery mines, these buoys carry volatile Sea Fire liqued that conflargrates when destroyed. A minefield acts as defense against torpedos.
Launches Repair Buoys using a complex system of spring and gears. When deployed, Repair Buoys restore the integrity of damaged hulls and masts.
Dark navy and gleaming silver, the burnished steel repels the fiercest of fires.
Contains 20 buoy shells that can be used in Springloader weapons
A tough yet sleek armor crafted from the mighty Lestari. Improves sailing speed.
Careful, or you'll singe the wood. Same as your brows!
Another naked flame and I'll load yer' into the Loader itself!
These buoys are meant for our friends! Don't spend too much time on 'em.
Ughh. Wet stockings. The worst thing in the world.
Wonder where those fancy wigs've been hiding these buoys.
So this is where the butcher made his powder, eh? Let's use it to butcher some of his lads.
Oi, you lot! Those things aren't for napping!
I don't think that pox's from La Peste, my lad.
Which one of you lot took a swig of my Bourgogne 1650?
We expect to be well paid. We'#re in it for the silver, lads.
Yes, join this, attach that. Remember, lad, or I'll join your head to the deck!
None may harm a captain of such extravagant tastes.
The banner... it calls...
Have you eaten yet? Plenty of asinan and salted fish to go around.
Ship upgrade for the Bedar.

description.general: Bigger and better, lads! That means you'd best blasted get moving!
And don't let me catch yer' sticking your head in there!
Essential drink for a pirate.
Refreshing drinking water.
Coffee brewed from Teuling's favorite beans.
Delicious rice dumplings wrapped with pandan leaves. Also a favorite among fish.
Steak and sides, prepared to Teuling's tastes.
As close as one can get to a mermaid
Calms the nerves, perfect for those Open Seas storms
Cheers to the Govenor!
A sweet reminder to thee, for tis' lonely out at sea
Meat obtained from the sea monster Lestari.
Grilled meat from the sea monster Lestari. Tastes like chicken.
Ever tried setting a cow on fire? That's why.
"Half the crew's limbs for its fuckin' head!"
"The wheels and cogs seem to sing harmoniously."
"Polish those plugs up, lads. We've got French wigs to blow up!"
Contains ballista bolts that can be used in Ballista weapons
description.1: Contains 40 ballista bolts that can be used in Ballista weapons
description.2: Contains 60 ballista bolts that can be used in Ballista weapons

description.general: Designed with the ability to repair fleets, this treasured cannon is coveted by admirals and merchants alike.
Like a century-old storm unleashed at sea, each blast renders keel and hull irreparable.
A tiger poised to strike with boisterous fury. It infuses incense from the Far East into its shells that trigger agression when inhaled.
"I'll stuff some of these in your traps if yer' keep yappin'!"
"After the bastards! They took out poor Bob!"
The electricity arcs gracefully from foe to foe. It's almost beautiful... except for the stench after.
These Imperial guns of Portuguese design infuse incense from the Far East into their shells, triggering agression when inhaled.
Its roar echoes the death of a celestial beast, its very heart a tempest of divine fury.
Spews beautiful death and fanfare, daring those who would oppose the legendary pirate queen.
Its clockwork bolts puncture hull and steel, sundering the very skies.
Your beauty masks cruel intent. The vibrant colors appear to shift and swirl, creating a display that disorients and enrages.
"Poor Bob tried to sneak a taste of monster stew."
"I'm not hiding! You are!"
Launches shimmering scales that slice through the seas, leaving thunder in their wake.
Meat from the Lestari that has been sliced thinly and stir-fried with fresh vegetables and served with a side of rice.
"How the hell did she get the job?!"
"Here, the General concorted devious ways for the Rempah rebels to burn."
"Lucky! You won't need to see your ugly mug in a mirror no more."
"Sorry, Cap'n. I accidentally dropped one. It went vertical."
"Where's Peg Leg's peg! Anything pointy goes in the barrel!"
"Hammer and tongs! They're gonna get a bolt through their skull!"
"Anyone seen Mr. Arrow?!"
"This fortress shall not be sunk. I vow it!"
Its muzzle, shaped like a maw, crackles with the essence of a storm.
It is said that this armor is blessed by the eight divines and will preserve a ship at the most dire times.
Copper wires have been woven into the hull, channeling the storm's fury into harmless flickers of light.
"Bloody blood-suckers."
"Eh, why's our hair standing on end?"
A delicious dessert stamped with an insignia on top. It is typically presented as a gift to family and friends.
A blackened metal frame groaning with tales of lost souls.
"I swear, Captain, them eyes followin' me about..."
"Yer kiss your mother with those cannons?!"
"Oi, lads! Hoist the colors! We're after blood this day!"
"That bottle ain't filled with brandy, lad."
"Smoke over there and I'll have one less ass to shove my boot up."
"Aye, we want them hot, lads! Hot enough to pierce through your stone-cold hearties!"
Each spark of the cannon calls on the strength of the beast.
Its delicate nozzle reduces foes to ash and dust.
The heavens watch over all, as does a night sky lit by fire and lightning.
This engineering marvel fires buoys that channel the life force of the vanquished.
May yours be a vessel of divine fervor and pure purpose.
Forged from the flesh of those long thought to have passed into the divine.
Golden crowns dip from a firm girdle, guarding an indomitable will.
"Get some of this, you pigeon-loving loons!"
"The cap't can pledge his soul to whoever he freakin' wants. I'm more worried about the rest of us..."
"Would you rather be a slowpoke or poked in your eye?"
"That Mr. Teuling ain't half-bad for a cockney, silver-haired bastard who prefers his coattails clean!"
"I... I feel like I can fling the whole ship at our foes!"
"Thank 'ee, mongrels, for your cannonballs!"
"Grab them pillows, lads. Those buoys need more cushioning than your sorry heads!"
"What the hell are ya doing, sea dogs, kicking that around like a bladder ball?!"
"Lads, that yellowish liquid had better not come from 'tween 'yer legs!"
"I'll stuff you in myself if I find one of yer' slackin' off!"
"Here, Bob, wanna see a magic trick?"
"Easy. All we need to do is connect this end to that e--"
"Here's a pretty prune all wrapped up for 'yer ass-puckers!"
"Captain! Should we use the rifle to rifle the rifled barrels?"
"Who's the fecker who last filled the pepper pouch?"
Unknowable runes are carved onto the barrel surface. Best left unspoken.
Like the ancient water serpent, this launcher ensures your wrath snakes through the waves unimpeded.
A rich, decadent fruitcake that happens to be a favorite of Scurlock's.
Barely edible if eaten raw.
The meat of a beast that stalks the African Coast, feasting on unfortunate seafarers
Mild flavor with a soft texture.
A large fruit with a strong odor and covered with thorns.
A stranded-island staple.
Popular for its sweet taste, those used for cooking are often called plantains.
Bland and viscous.
Crucial ingredient for many dishes.
Cooking the mutton will reduce its strongly bitter taste.
Plain and unassuming.
The fruit can be boiled and ground into an edible, highly nutritious paste.
Bitter flavor and strong texture.
Strong, sour smell. Would taste better cooked.
Would taste better cooked.
Best cut of meat from a Crocodile.
Best cut of meat from a Hippo.
Highly potent, just one bite is enough to make any person go mad.
Ship upgrade for the Schooner.
description.1: Upgrades the ship level from 0 to 1.
description.2: Upgrades the ship level from 1 to 2.
description.3: Upgrades the ship level from 2 to 3.
description.4: Upgrades the ship level from 3 to 4.
description.5: Upgrades the ship level from 4 to 5.
description.6: Upgrades the ship level from 5 to 6.
description.7: Upgrades the ship level from 6 to 7.

description.general: Reduces the strength of the Shell-Shocked status effect and offers exceptional resistance against Explosive damage. Inspired by the enduring might of ancient gods.
Nullifies all damage of the Ablaze status effect while Bracing, and fortifies against burning weapons. Designed to stand against the Ungwana in all their fury.
Increases weapon damage while at the height of Hull Health. Favored among Sainte-Anne raiders who are known for striking and vanishing untouched.
Enhances Bracing which nullifies some damage, especially when well-timed.
Encased in a storm-dark scales, this bombard summons a lightning strike seconds after a shot lands, electrifying nearby foes.
Rains a hail of destructive shells, damaging multiple foes in an area. Suited to blasting holes in enemy hulls and causing them to be Flooded.
Long-barrel cannons adept at destroying targets at long range. Great at tearing enemy sails and leaving them immobile.
A weapon torged by dishonorable scallywags, striking from afar to leave hulls Punctured and decks Flooded. Also adept at rendering ships vulnerable to Crew Attacks.
A marvel of Dutch engineering that shoots off explosive flares, culminating in a delayed explosion. Its shots also deal increased damage to enemy fortifications.
This crimson-coated ballista fires three bolts at once. Should all three bolts hit the same mark, they erupt in flames in a devastating follow-up.
A medium-sized cannon that rips targets apart at close range. Its shots deliver concussive blasts, causing the crew to be Shell-Shocked and unable to fire weapons for a short period.
A medium-sized cannon that rips targets apart at close range by firing deadly shrapnel. Also weakens their armor by leaving their hulls Punctured.
Compact yet deadly, this bronze cannon delivers explosive rounds that can trigger a second, delayed explosion.
A versatile cannon that offers good range, damage, and reload speed. Its incendiary shots set targets Ablaze.
The steel bores of this hardened cannon deliver explosive shells that excel at destroying fortifications.
The mighty guns speak but once, unleashing a devastating flurry in unison. Its immense power tears through sails, leaving enemies crippled and vulnerable.
"Sweep the guns good, lads. We'll coat the bastards with their own insides."
"Get the mallet and planks! Or I'll use your arse to plug that hole."
"Sugar, spice, and everything not-so-nice."
"The wolf hunts us. Its eyes follow us through the fog, like death."
"Those tips need to stay dry, lads! Or our foes gonna do the lightin'."
"Stick that arm in there and pray your friend doesn't light the fuse."
"Ha! What a shot! In one end and clean out the other!"
"Poor Jimmy. Told him not to nap in the log room."
A specialized station used to hone mortar barrels, resulting in faster shots.
